tool_description: Analyzes current inventory levels, turnover rates, and stock availability to inform pricing decisions.
error_messages: Invalid stock level: current_stock_level must be non-negative integer
Invalid reorder point: reorder_point must be positive integer
Invalid lead time: lead_time_days must be positive integer
Inconsistent inventory data: current stock and reorder point values don't align with historical patterns
usage: Specify product_id, current_stock_level, reorder_point, and lead_time_days to analyze inventory position and urgency for pricing adjustments.

stock_status.description: Inventory status: healthy, low, critical, overstocked

days_of_inventory.description: Estimated days until stockout at current sales rate

pricing_recommendation.description: Suggested pricing action based on inventory: increase, decrease, maintain
